script.name: Lib.Cmd.MLCC.S.Assist.Carrier
script.description: Lib Cmd: MLCC Sortie Assist - Carrier

line.comment: * If our casualties are too high acording to mission options, we end
* The option is the amount of casualties we can sustain before leaving.

sval.val: Lib Cmd: MLCC Sortie Assist - Carrier
If our casualties are too high acording to mission options, we end
The option is the amount of casualties we can sustain before leaving.
